properties.areaDesc: Mississippi, MO; New Madrid, MO; Fulton, KY
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 8:31PM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following river in
Illinois...Missouri...Kentucky...

Mississippi River at Cape Girardeau
Mississippi River at Thebes
Mississippi River at New Madrid

.Heavy rainfall over the past 36 hours, along with expected rain
and snow melt from the middle and upper Mississippi Valley next
week, will cause river levels to rise along the Mississippi River.
Cape Girardeau and Thebes are forecast to enter flood stage later
this weekend and crest in moderate flood stage midweek. New Madrid,
which will also take in floodwaters from the Ohio River, is forecast
to reach flood stage early Monday and crest in minor flood stage next
weekend.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Mississippi River at New Madrid
* from Monday morning until further notice.
* At  8:00 PM Saturday the stage was 32.1 feet.
* Flood Stage is 34.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Monday morning and continue to
rise to near 37.5 feet by Saturday early afternoon, January 18th.
* Impact...At 38.0 Feet...Heavy agricultural damage begins.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
